# Research Directory: Wildfire Analyst Enterprise

## Overview
Wildfire Analyst Enterprise by Technosylva is an integrated commercial platform designed for real-time simulation, decision support, and operational wildfire management. This web-based system offers advanced capabilities for modeling and analyzing wildfire behavior, aiding in effective decision-making during fire incidents. The platform's emphasis on real-time simulation and API integration makes it a valuable tool for wildfire researchers and practitioners seeking to enhance their operational fire management strategies.

## Key Features and Capabilities
- Real-time simulation of wildfire behavior
- Web-based platform accessible from various devices
- Decision support tools for tactical fire management
- API integration for seamless data exchange with other systems
- Advanced visualization and mapping capabilities

## Technical Specifications
- Model type and approach: Integrated platform utilizing physics-based fire behavior models
- Input data requirements: Geospatial data including topography, fuel types, weather conditions, and ignition points
- Output products: Predicted fire spread, intensity, and behavior maps; decision support tools
- Spatial and temporal resolution: High spatial resolution for detailed fire behavior modeling; real-time temporal updates
- Computational requirements: High-performance computing resources recommended for real-time simulation and analysis
